text: Happy Birthday to you! Hope that you soend your day doing the things you love with the people you value most
Happy Birthday to my (insert relation), hope you have a wonderful day!
Another trip around the sun, Happy Birthday!

I Love You a Latke!
May Your Menorah Burn Brighter than your Latkes!
Keep the 'Han' in HAN-ukkah!
Happy Hanukkah! C'mon baby light my fire!
Dreidel, Dreidel, Dreidel I made you out of my clay. When it's dry and ready, oh dreidel I shall play! Happy Hanukkah!
It's a miracle that I ate eight donuts, I thought I could only eat one! Happy Hanukkah!
Happy Hanuk-kat!
Happy Challah Days!
You're not dry and ready?!?! Happy Hanukkah!
Seasons Eating, to you and your family! Happy Hanukkah!
More Gelt, Less Guilt! Happy Hanukkah!
Deck the Hall with boughs and challahs! Happy Hanukkah!
My secret to a happy, stress-free Christmas... I'm Jewish! Happy Hanukkah!
I want a Christmas tree for Hanukkah! Happy Hanukkah!
Every Hanukkah we eat fried food, we gamble and light things on fire. It's like we live in the south! Happy Hannukah!
Fo-gelt about it! Happy Hannukah!
Gelt in your mouth, not in your hands! Happy Hanukkah!
If your cell phone was on 10%, but lasted for 8 straight days... Now you know what Hanukkah is all about!
Drop it like it's top! Happy Hanukkah!
Hanukkah Mazel Toes to you and your family!
You spin me right round! Happy Hanukkah!
Gimmel all your lovin'! Happy Hanukkah!
Hope your Hanukkah isn't dreidfull!
Happy Hanukkah from Dr. Dre-idel!
I hope Santa leaves you a ton of presents, but I hope the reindeers do not leave behind any ~presents~ on your lawn! Merry Christmas!
Christmas is Claus for celebration! Merry X-mas!
Santa ho ho hopes you've been good this year. Merry Christmas!
I'm glad to have people like you in my life to send Christmas cards. I am truly blessed this Christmas!
It's all fun and games 'till Santa checks the Naughty List.
Have a very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
May your fun be large and bills be small this year. Merry Christmas!
Santa saw your Facebook – you're getting a dictionary this year! Merry Xmas!
All I want for Christmas is you! Merry Christmas!
